title: raamaa dheivama
sahitya:
rAma deivamA rAga rAga lObhamA

anupallavi

 mOmu jUpamA jagan mOhanakaramA

caraNam 1

 donga jADalEla illu bangArAanA ranga vibhUSaNuniki panganAma midina rIti
   
caraNam 2

 venna dA bhujinci gOpi kanya mukhamuna tinnaga nalandinaTTu dInarakSaka sItA
   
caraNam 3

 nErpu jUpumA angalArpu bApumA Orpu galgu tyAgarAju okapAri sharaNaNTE
